p:
Antioxidant activity was assessed using 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH; Sigma-Aldrich). DPPH was prepared at 0.4 mM in methanol and mixed with each polyherb at a final concentration of 1 mg/mL. It was incubated at 37°C for 30 min in the dark, and the absorbance was measured at 517 nm using a Synergy™ H1 automated microplate reader (Bio-Tek, Winooski, VT, USA). The activity was represented as a percentage to that of distilled water containing 0.5% DMSO as a control and calculated using the following formula:
